website_summaries.verdict: These hairdressing scissors deliver a brilliant combination of convenience and quality, but the price will put them out of the budget range of some shoppers.
pros: Durable scissors are constructed from premium stainless steel
Come with removable rubber finger inserts
Sold with a zippered storage case
Precise blades will continue to impress for an extended period of time
cons: Finger holes may be too small for some users

customer_reviews.title: These are tricky to use for me as a non professional
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a pair of professional haircutting scissors before and i am not a professional hair cutter. Maybe there is something I don't know about hair cutting scissors. Given that, this is my review. I expected them to function like regular scissors except be sharper for cutting hair. These blades do not match up like regular scissors. The two blades don't touch unless you hold them at just the right angle. It seems like they even have a metal piece to keep them from touching unless you angle your fingers in the holes just right. The blades are very sharp and will cut, if they are held properly, but that is difficult for me to do.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with scissors. I used it within a hour of receiving it. I have been trimming my 4c natural hair with the same scissors I use to cut fabric, until a friend of mine told my that I was crazy for using a fabric scissors on my hair, no wonder I had split ends. I took her advice and purchased a hair/ barber scissors. This scissors is very sharp & easy to hold, easy to trim my hair. PS: very beautiful with silver/gold. I am impresses👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Never just an item by its pricing!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shears as a replacement to a lost pair I just purchased a week ago. I didn't want to spend too much hoping to find my most expensive pair. Omg, I wish I would have ordered these first. It would have saved me so much money. Being a barber and hairstylist for almost 20 years, these are the best shears I have ever owned. They cut hair like butter. I have recommended these to my coworkers who quickly ordered theirs. These shears are a true definition of "Never judge a book by its cover" especially when it comes to pricing. Love these shears so much im ordering another pair along with the thinning shears.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a non-pro to use
customer_reviews.text: I cut my own hair and my mom's hair with these. I'm no hairdresser, and I'm sure a professional could tell, but I like having control over my own hair and I hate spending $20 (I've even spent $60) on a trim. Like, millimeters off. Either that or they cut too much... These are easy to use, sharp, and I have no issues with split ends. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. VANDREUMEL

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with the results, I never cut my hair all by myself before but this scissors are so easy to hold and use. They are very sharp what helps a lot too. But if you have big fingers I don’t know if you will use easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hair.
customer_reviews.text: I had some shears that I had gotten at CVS confiscated during travel because I had forgotten to put them in check-in baggage, so I searched for another pair online and was going based on reviews. That lead me to get these scissors; however, they are neither as sharp or as usable as I read other reviews to claim. I had frustratingly poor control in cutting hair with these shears and the little rubber rings keep coming off during use. I ended up getting another pair of serrated shears from CVS that were cheaper and WAY better!
customer_reviews.author: Turtledragon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cut at all! I bought these because of all the rave reviews and these are the dullest shears I've ever bought. I ended up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m a barber these scissors came sharp, but somethings so wrong with them. They don’t cut right the shears over lap I tried to untighten them but it’s not working. Very disappointed cause the good reviews I read.
customer_reviews.author: danielle marie

customer_reviews.title: Cutting Edge
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cutting my bangs! Very sharp blades and smooth action. I like the tension dial for maximum control. I wondered about the size of the finger holes, but they work for my medium female hands and the rubber finger inserts give a bit of grippiness. I was even able to thin my bangs a bit, the scissors are that sharp. There are lots of shears from different manufacturers out there, but I went with Utopia Care because of my satisfaction with prior purchases.
customer_reviews.author: bona fide shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: BEST SCISSORS EVER!! I have two daughters who don't like going to the hairdresser, so I do my best to cut their hair at home. I've tried several pairs of scissors, and despite the fact that their hair isn't really that thick, have struggled to cut a smooth, straight line in the past. These scissors made it so easy! I was able to cut their hair in half the time and it was so much neater than in the past. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp!
customer_reviews.text: These were not sharp enough when they arrived to cut hair. I was expecting them to be very sharp but they could not cut a straight edge in my daughters hair. No, I am not a professional, but I have had some classes and guidance and have cut her hair several times before. Her hair is very thick so I do it in layers, but the scissors were still not sharp enough to support a good or even mediocre simple straight across hair cut.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Borgerding

customer_reviews.title: Getting Dull
customer_reviews.text: Loved these scissors when I first started to use them. However, after cutting my husband’s hair only about 5 times since I purchased them, they are getting dull. What happened? I still have the scissors I was previously using for over 10 years and they’re still sharp. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Garfield

customer_reviews.title: They really are sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a pair of these last June to replace the pitiful scissors that have been in our hair cutting box. I didn't want to spend a lot of money so I bought these. What a wonderful surprise! I cut my husband's hair and I love that they are sharp and have a blunt end. I recently bought another pair for myself to trim my bangs. They are great. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: livetolove

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I am not a stylist professional. I used then.to trim my hair and really liked them. Light, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: I cut my own hair and my friend thought I'd had it done.
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice weight and cut cleanly. I watched a BUNCH of YouTube videos, and began cutting my own hair. I think the best tip is never hold and cut when the scissors are horizontal. have them sorta parallel to your hair and make little snips upward. If it takes too long go do something else and come back. Who cares. I made some bad mistakes but because of the tutorials I chose, (cutting top hair last) no one can tell. What a relief to have my hair cut.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Yu

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair to do quarantine haircuts for myself and my husband. (I have no experience cutting hair) The scissors work well enough. After reading the reviews I was happy to see mine came in clean, un-opened packaging. The rubber inserts don't stay in place but they don't really make a difference. Im giving it four stars because I would have thought they would be sharper, but I admit I don't know how sharp these type of scissors should be. Overall happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: YogiKat

customer_reviews.title: Barely a step up from safety scissors
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly dull, haircut turned in to a hack job. Won’t even use as junk drawer scissors
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Thyne

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a lot of scissors grooming my shih tzu over the last four years, and these are absolutely the best I've ever used! I wasn't sure if I'd use the finger hole inserts, but I really like them since it makes them super comfortable. They are a nice sturdy weight without being too heavy. But best of all, they are super sharp and arrived with perfect amount of tension. They cut through chunks of hair effortlessly! Can't imagine I'd ever use another brand!! I'm now ordering their facial scissors and thinning shears.
customer_reviews.author: ruthm

customer_reviews.title: was good then got dull
customer_reviews.text: they were very good and very sharp for the first few haircuts and trims but then got so dull that they are unusable now and literally do not cut the hair when i try. so now they’re just fancy scissors for paper. wish they stayed sharp longer but maybe if i find a way to sharpen them i could use them again
customer_reviews.author: Julianne

customer_reviews.title: easy cutting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace ones that ended up chewing rather than cutting. I especially like the ability to adjust the tension as on the more expensive ones available. I found the action really smooth but edges sometimes pushed the hair along instead of cutting cleanly. I ended up putting a slightly serrated tooth along the edges by stroking the cutting edge diagonally with a sharpening stone diagonally in both directions a few times and it cuts perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: the putterer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and don’t cut freely
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut my husband’s hair and my 2 year old daughter’s hair. They are much easier to use on my daughter than my husband. I previously was using some really cheap scissors but they were very lightweight and I felt like I had more control. These are heavy and I just can’t get used to them. They don’t cut as freely as I would like. I’ll give them a few more cuts before I go back to the other pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just ok. If you are a hair stylist you know the tip of the shears have to be sharp. The middle of the blades are ok, but the tips are dull.
customer_reviews.author: DLVL

customer_reviews.title: Pulls hairs often
customer_reviews.text: These scissors cut but also pulled hair almost every snip. My lighter plastic handle scissors work fine; I dont know why i even bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Whistler

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable tension makes these shears worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors work well. The difference between these and other generic barber shears? Adjustable blade tension - And that makes all the difference. The click stops on the blade tightening mechanism make it easy to adjust tension. I cut my sons' hair almost entirely using scissors and these are exactly what I need. Don't know how the blades would hold up under professional use but for me they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Flash G

customer_reviews.title: Such good shears for such a great price
customer_reviews.text: Such good shears for such a great price! I ordered another pair from amazon which had better ratings (probably because of the infestation of bot ratings on amazon these days) and this one was far better. I've used it to cut hair at least 10 times not and its also great for just trimming off split ends. The bag it comes in too is really nice quality and helps me in taking care of them/putting them away.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: cut through fine hair easily
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a stylist. I bought these for touch ups and home jobs. They cut really well for an affordable pair of snips. I'm way more pleased with them then a comparably priced pair of Goody I picked up at the drug store years back. I don't plan on putting them through heavy use, so I can't attest to how long they will stay sharp, but I will be recommending these if you need to keep a pair of hair scissors handy at the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla L

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it once to cut my bangs and it did an excellent job. I was looking for a nice pair of hair cutting scissors and so far this one meets my needs. The quality felt great and it cut my hair nice and smooth. I like the inner rubber circles to help with my grip. I do have small fingers so it’s perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: JandD

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors for hair cutting.
customer_reviews.text: Have always had my haircut at home by my wife. Latest shears were not sharp and after exploring options with reviews on Amazon these were chosen. My “barber” says they are sharp, easy to hold, and as a former professional cosmetologist attests these are excellent hair cutting shears.
customer_reviews.author: Bob@Kaylahaus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for personal use. They are good quality and very sharp. I would highly recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Marci W

customer_reviews.title: They are ok...better than Walmart or Target for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sharp as I expected. But they did the job. The price is still low for the quality. I would have been happier with sharper sheers. Not sure how long they will last. They seem to be pretty sturdy. Will update if that changes sooner than expected. Overall...they are ok. Not as good as I expect but better than Walmart or Target sheers for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: A Fam of Smart Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors. Super sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these scissors because of the pandemic. I now use electric clippers for the sides and these scissors for the top of my head and so far I am supper impressed. They are really sharp so you have to be really careful not to cut your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: peter sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: They came in damaged. When I tried using them for the first time my return window had closed. Bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, satisfying hair scissors!
customer_reviews.text: These Professional Barber Hair Cutting Scissors cut like a hot knife through butter! Pleasant in my average sized woman’s hand and prettily designed, its easy, too, to make fine, finishing snips at angles. These are just what I was looking for to replace long-used pro hair scissors lost when our house burned down. These scissors are even much better than those — excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new, positively received used scissors
customer_reviews.text: New to cutting and feels good with maneuvers. 2 stars because I ordered new scissors and definitely received a used/sharpened pair....not very honest sales.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Just Don't Cut Well
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair, and the scissors just didn't cut well or smoothly. I tried sharpening them, but it didn't help. It seemed like there was a gap between the blades for the hair to get stuck in without cutting. The tension adjustment did not fix it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Really great scissors
customer_reviews.text: I’m a novice and have only used these to trim around my husbands ears and trim my 7 year olds very long hair, but I think they’re great! They’re very sharp and make it easy to cut the hair. I didn’t notice any breakage or split ends on the hair after using it (from dull cuts). They fit my fingers well and are easy to hold and maneuver. For an amateur, these have been great!
customer_reviews.author: MommaLazer

customer_reviews.title: Want to know if it's worth it???
customer_reviews.text: Loved it ! I wanted to cut my long hair by myself for the first time above the shoulders and I saw this video on tiktok on how to do it so I thought why not?? After reading lots of reviews and comparing prices I settled on this one. Its eryv sturdy and easy to use for someone that barely know how to cut their own hair! Cut through my ponytail of hair so cleanly. I'm so glad it worked out. Product is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charleen

customer_reviews.title: Very dull
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am super disappointed with this item. They weren’t very sharp when I received them and I was only able to get 2 trims out of them before they completely went dull. Now I am not able to use them to cut my 18 mo olds hair, time to buy a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alicea Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best in its class!
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday and used it. The product exceeded my expectations in all respect. This product represents that Amazon is the best place to shop if one is careful in choosing the right product at a right price. I appreciate Amazon not only to making this product available but also to place it in the Amazon's Choice category. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Babul

customer_reviews.title: Ok! Maybe for other hair styles
customer_reviews.text: These were actually really good scissors. They’re super sharp so be careful. I was trying to cut my own bangs and didn’t realize how sharp these were and literally chopped off my whole bang way shorter than I wanted. That’s because the way I cut my bangs required a more dull scissor. So be aware if you are used to cutting from a more dull scissor.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I am now writing a review after owning this product for so over a year now. It is the best hair scissors I have ever tried. I cut my own hair at home and the ease and sharpe was of the blades help me to maintain healthy hair at home.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: This product was good for the first 2-3 uses and now the blades are dull. Also the scissors rip my hair out now. They get stuck between the two blades. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loosens frequently
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for home haircuts, and my main complaint is that they frequently come loose and need to be tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Every house should have a pair of hair cutting sheers!
customer_reviews.text: When the CoViD Pandemic shut down the barber shops, my handsome husband started looking really shaggy. From watching my stylist do my hair, I knew how to layer, but had read on line not to try doing hair with kitchen, desk or sewing scissors. These were perfect, easy to use... and he's handsome again!
customer_reviews.author: Bard of the Brandywine

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used them once, and they are sharp! I am not a hairdresser, I just like cutting my hair sometimes. These are the sharpest scissors I have ever used. I managed to cut my two fingers without even feeling the cuts, so be really careful if you aren't use to very sharp scissors. I need to start holding my hair with a comb, or learning to hold the hair well below the area I am cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Moonbeam

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bear in mind I am a pandemic hairstylist only, but I am impressed! These are a HUGE improvement over the probably dull drugstore scissors I was using. Very sharp, so be careful! Easy to use, though I don't follow their directions for how to hold the scissors.
customer_reviews.author: KMSF

customer_reviews.title: Chink in the blade!
customer_reviews.text: If I open more than 2 inches, there's an obvious chink on the blade edge so it wont cut and wont close past the chink without forcing. Very frustrating. Unfortuantely, they went in a drawer when they arrived without being used. Now that Ive used them, it's too late to return. Its bothersome that QC did not happen at any point from manufacture to assembly to packaging. Look like nice scissors and part of the blade not deformed is sharp and works well.. If you order, check the blades and the open-close point when they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done. Works for left handed people.
customer_reviews.text: I’m no hair stylist, just a mom and wife learning how to cut hair at home. I wanted a pair of scissors that did the job and didn’t break the bank. These do the trick. I’m also left handed, and they are comfortable to work with. Are they salon approved? Probably not, but they are a heck of a lot better than kitchen scissors!
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, well made
customer_reviews.text: I cut two teen daughters hair and these worked great! Very sharp and made better than others I’ve tried. Very comfortable placement for fingers, and the tightness of the scissors can be adjusted, which I also liked.
customer_reviews.author: Jensens

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for some scissors to trim wife's hair since she does not want to go out to salon yet with Covid still around. These are well worth the money. Very comfortable to hold and easy to use. Nicely balanced and made cutting hair a breeze
customer_reviews.author: H B

customer_reviews.title: Great hair cutting scissors
customer_reviews.text: Gave myself first haircut tonight. Wow. What a joy to use. Very comfortable to hold/control. Adjustable tension is great to find right amount of 'drag' on the scissors. Warning. Scissors are very sharp so don't cut yourself. (cuts and frequent hand-washing don't mix well) Very satisfied with these scissors. (don't have to look like a caveman no more)
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissors for Trimming Husband's Hair With
customer_reviews.text: Use this to trim my husband's hair. It keeps him righty tidy. The blades are sharp and I really feel like I am using a professional barber scissors. These scissors make me look like I am a pro when I am done with cutting his hair. I kept watching how the barber was cutting his hair and thought I can do that and I can these scissors help me to accomplish that!!!! The scissors are a nice weight and fit comfortably in my hand. They open and close easily. I like the case they came in to. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Val C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This scissors were amazingly sharp! I am not a professional but I cut my wife's hair and it worked great. They were very reasonably priced and cannot compare to a more expensive brand but they did the job I needed them too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home cuts.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are easy to use and very sharp. Do a great job on home haircuts during this lockdown. Unfortunately the silicone lining on one side where fingers go keeps coming out but otherwise I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: lindase

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to cut layers into my own hair, as well as to give my boyfriend his bi-weekly hair cut. We both have VERY thick hair and these cut through it like it's butter. They're comfortable in my hand, and they really do a great job of making nice clean cut lines. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for an affordable pair of at-home scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the purpose intended. Is sharp and good size to cut hair. Have used twice and see myself using if more in near future . I am using it at home , to trim my sons hair . I am not user about the use of it professionally. The case it comes is good and helps in keeping them clean and away from dust.
customer_reviews.author: Huzaifa

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors for haircut
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it last night and it arrived this morning! Super fast shipping! The scissors are sharp and very easy to control. I just cut my bangs with it and the result is as I expected, if not better! Would definitely recommend these for casual hair trimming at home! Will update review again if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Auri

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and affordable
customer_reviews.text: If you cut hair at home or like to handle your own bangs or something, this are exactly what you're looking for. However the one bad point is the grip things fall out all.the.time. I'm thinking about gluing them on
customer_reviews.author: Alys

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm happy with how these cut hair. They are sharp and cut smoothly. I was disappointed that the finger lever fell off after only the second use. I kept the scissors stored in their case and they've never been dropped. The quality is somewhat cheap and seems to match its price. I'd give this fewer stars if they had cost more. Overall, they are decent for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great cut, bad finger holes
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would improve these scissors is bigger finger holes. I have short small fingers and even my fingers get stuck. Update: 4/3/2016. Removed finger guards and they are roomier, have not used them without guards to verify comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Nachogir1

customer_reviews.title: Professional? It would depend on the profession.
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are well made, they are sharp enough to nick your ears if you are not careful enough (I wasn’t). They also come with a travel case which is probably what they were intended for. If you ever cut hair for somebody other than yourself you would notice right away that their blades are about one inch shorter than the “Real McCoy”.
customer_reviews.author: Algesoft

customer_reviews.title: Fine scissors
customer_reviews.text: They seem fine. I bought these to cut my shaggy dog’s hair. He’s very wriggly but these scissors make it possible to cut his hair without holding the hair in my hand, so I have a hand free to hold him still. Otherwise, I need three hands for the job!
customer_reviews.author: barbara sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am not a barber but cut family members hair occasionally. Used once so far. The overall quality is better than expected at the price. Good looking, cuts cleanly, has pressure adjustment, fits the hand well. Easily as good as my last hair scissors that cost twice as much. I would (will) buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Alpha male

customer_reviews.title: Sharper than con air and other scissors on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Nice sharp shears. Sharper than other shears I have bought on Amazon. Way sharper than con air shears you would buy at Walmart. Nice finger holes. Sleek look. Glad I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hair Cutting Tool Razor Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair cutting tool. Very sharp and tension is perfect and adjustable. Excellent hair cutting tool. I have no idea why anyone would give these a bad review.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Brymer

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Cut “like a hot knife through butter.”’
customer_reviews.text: These are great scissors. Well designed and ver sturdy. They cut boxes, or very fine hair without losing any ability to cut well “like a hot knife through butter.”
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably good value!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price. Unbelievable. They are razor sharp. I cut my daughter's hair pretty often and kitchen scissors were getting too dull so I said whatever I'll buy some cheap sheers. I am so impressed with these. Just as good if not better than the expensive ones I found. Five stars all day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Case

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to groom my puppy. Price is great, quite sharp and fits well in my hand. Scissors not too long so it diminishes risk of accidents with a squirmy puppy. My groomer recommended these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for home.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for home use. Not so much for the shop. Small errors in the grinding causes a catch and pull. Cost more to have prof. Sharpened then to keep..... Sent them home for stash trims. cant use on customers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Raubar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scissors
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional hairdresser! I was looking for a pair of scissors that can help me lightly trim my hair without pulling it and leaving uneven ends. These worked perfectly! They are lightweight, sharp, and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems great to me
customer_reviews.text: The same day I received both this and the thinning shears, I tested them out on a wig that was in desperate need of a trim- after tightening the side screw, they worked fabulously, cut through the hair so easily the 'knife through butter' analogy comes to mind. I WILL need to invest in a sharpener for these eventually, but at the moment, I haven't a single complaint. :) Note: The scissors come in little imitation leather zip-up cases, and also have little black sparkly rubber liners in the finger holds which makes them much easier to use for long periods of time without the metal loops cutting into your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Haiden

customer_reviews.title: SHARP
customer_reviews.text: I cut my own hair and was looking for a scissor that was both affordable and effective. This scissor is both! Fits in my hand well and is extremely sharp, making my haircuts easier, quicker, and most important, looking right.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Professional Barber Hair Cutting Scissors/Shears (6.5 Inches) with Fine Adjustable Tension Screw
customer_reviews.text: Really nice high quality and very sharp Professional Barber/hair cutting scissors 6.5 in. that come with a fine adjustable tension screw. Price was competitive and reasonable. A+
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Laird

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of professional type hair shears. I was able to cut my own hair with precision. Very sharp resulting in no split ends after the cut. Would recommend these to any adult.
customer_reviews.author: Ruggirello

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are very cheaply made- broke the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are very sharp and amazing for cutting hair! My husband uses them to do my pixie cut, and I have used them on my children's hair as well.
customer_reviews.author: ldb

customer_reviews.title: Great for at-home-haircuts!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Love these styling scissors. Easy to hold and use. Perfect for at home haircuts.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And the finger holes are plenty large ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this years ago instead of fighting with my cheapy, which always hurt my fingers after a while. I use it on my own hair, and my dog, who gets thick matts -- works a charm!! I love it! And the finger holes are plenty large for me with the inserts in place. I never had a scissor with an adjustment screw so that's interesting too, haven't used that part yet. Be careful and don't be rushed cuz these are sharp!
customer_reviews.author: ji

customer_reviews.title: Very very very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Did I mention they are sharp? They are. Very. They cut well, they appear to be of good quality, and they are very very very sharp. Take care around your ears. Don't pull a van Gogh.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for trimming my split ends. They cut so nicely and came in a nice case to keep them in. These are high quality scissors
customer_reviews.author: HaleyReviews

customer_reviews.title: The BEST shears ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a feel for the new shears I purchased. So this morning, I performed a quick cut to my bangs by adding a jagged cut. They were so comfortable in my hand and they were noticeably different from the shears I have purchased from Sally Beauty Supply. I will likely order another pair. They are just that good. The cut was smooth and professional. They are light and as I mentioned, very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Quality scissors at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am not a barber, just a guy that wanted some good scissors. These scissors seem to be excellent quality and are very sharp. The tension adjustment allows you to adjust them as desired. The finger holes are a little small. The scissors come with a rubber insert in each finger hole, I assume for added comfort and to keep them from slipping from your hand. I could not use the thumb hole with this grommet installed as my thumb would not fit so I removed it. They came with a surprisingly nice zippered case. The quality exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Fixit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied scissors cut well nice looking scissors easy to handle great price for me who just does shape up , sharp ,just a bit not long
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional so I can only speak for my home use, these work great for trimming the ends of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that quarantine haircut! Several steps up,, in fact five whole staircases up,, from using sewing scissors I’m cutting my own hair from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Perez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are great scissors but when I purchased them before they had a beautiful case to store them in. I was very disappointed when it showed up without the beautiful case. That just cheapens the sissies and evening though I cut a lot of hair I will not get them again. Now the get put in a drawer with all the combs and supplies. Very disappointed and will look for a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Fratt

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these scissors that cut hair easily
customer_reviews.text: These actually work and the mate black and gold finish is attractive. I have other Japanese scissors I bought at a beauty supply store that look pro but can barely cut hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Work well for trimming 4C hair. The scissors were sharp, but due to the length they are a bit difficult to use for reaching the back of my own hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors! Best I've ever had. I cut my own hair, and these are so precise. I'm able to cut up and down so I don't just get a straight line. The price is really good, too. I've bought scissors before that cost more with less performance than these.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Liebenderfer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scissor
customer_reviews.text: The scissor I bought was 6.5 inch, a little bit long but kind of ok. It cuts hair very smoothly and precisely. I cut my front hair yesterday and it did a fine job. I highly recommend these professional scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia_

customer_reviews.title: Good backup shears...
customer_reviews.text: Being licensed, I bought these because I forgot my scissors while traveling. I used them on famiy and they did the job. I would not use these everyday in a salon though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great shears for home cuts
customer_reviews.text: Impressive for the price. These work fine for hair trimming. Nice little zipper case. I use my Wahl on #7 to cut my hair short, about 3/4 of an inch. My wife double checks my work so I don't have any stray hairs sticking up. She finishes with the Utopia 6.5 inch shears mostly for around the ears and cutting across the back of the head. We both have large hands so these work great. The shears are sharp and precise. We just use them for hair cutting and have used them several times. Seems like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: These are decent scissors. Better than using kitchen scissors on your hair and pretty cheap. There is a bit of folding at times . Good for people who just need a quarantine cut.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Received my scissors in 2 days and really impressed with the quality . I am a professional hair stylist and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: Scissors come sharp out of the packaging. Very ergonomic, feel good on the hand while in use, matte black finish is a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: BeEasyYeezy

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these scissors
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these scissors. He did not realize the difference a good quality of scissors made until he had these. However, the method of shipping was undesirable. The package came torn.
customer_reviews.author: Kbcfarms

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: 4.7 across the board. Great value. So long as they are less than 15 bucks. Kinda heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Relic 57

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors for cutting hair
customer_reviews.text: I was cutting my hair at home for years with regular, general use scissors. Now I can't believe I did that for so many years. Now that I've owned these scissors for just over 3 years, I can say that they make cutting hair evenly a very easy task. They've stayed sharp & my hair doesn't splay away from the scissors when I go to make a cut. I highly recommend these scissors for cutting hair.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Great construction, and extremely sharp out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, and extremely sharp out of the box. Deducted one star because the finger holes are really small. I have normal sized hands for a man, wear a medium sized glove, and had to take the rubberized inserts out of the eye holes in order to have any hope of using these scissors. It's still a tight fit even with the inserts out, but the scissors are great otherwise, and it's not like I need a lot of leverage from them, so I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Crrink

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are professional grade style
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through many scissor's for my needs and these have been the best. They arrived in a nice carry case for times they aren't being used. The rings around the fingers protect you so they don't hurt you after using them for a longer period of time. They are solid and appear as very professional barber scissors. Great purchase for a great price. Will be buying a second pair just to have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Professional Barber Hair Cutting Scissors/Shears (6.5 Inches) with Fine Adjustable Tension Screw and Detachable Finger Rest - Silver
feature_bullets: Japanese stainless steel is used for high quality and durability
The scissors measure 6 ½ inch with cutting blades that measure 2 ½ inch
Includes removable rubber finger inserts to fit any thumb and finger
The superior quality ensures a clean-cut, every time
High end scissors for a very reasonable price

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
